songs.title: Hello, Goodbye
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
You say, "Yes," I say, "No"
You say, "Stop," and I say, "Go, go, go"
Whoa

[Chorus]
You say goodbye, and I say hello
Hello, hello
I don’t know why you say goodbye
I say hello
Hello, hello
I don't know why you say goodbye
I say hello

[Verse 2]
I say, "High," you say, "Low"
You say, "Why?", I say, "I don't know"
Oh, no

[Chorus]
You say goodbye, and I say hello
Hello, hello
I don’t know why you say goodbye
I say hello
Hello, hello
I don't know why you say goodbye
I say hello

[Bridge]
Why do you say goodbye? (Goodbye)
Oh, no

[Chorus]
You say goodbye, and I say hello
Hello, hello
I don’t know why you say goodbye
I say hello
Hello, hello
I don't know why you say goodbye
I say hello
Hello, hello
I don't know why you say goodbye
I say hello

[Outro]
Hello, goodbye
Whoa, oh
